Spark of Life.name: Spark of Life
Spark of Life.flavor: Flames erupt around your enemies, charring their flesh while comforting your allies.
Spark of Life.effect: Each bloodied ally in the burst regains 5 + your Wisdom modifier hit points.

Elder Flame.name: Elder Flame
Elder Flame.flavor: You call forth a living piece of Everflame and set it against your enemies.
Elder Flame.effect: You conjure a shard of Everflame in an unoccupied square within range. The shard lasts until the end of the encounter. When any ally within 2 squares of the shard hits an enemy, the attack deals 1d10 extra fire damage to that enemy. As a move action, you can move the shard 5 squares. You can use the Elder Flame Attack power, centered on the shard. Doing so destroys the shard.
Elder Flame.requirement: The Elder Flame power must be active for you to use this power.

Guardian's Shield.name: Guardian's Shield
Guardian's Shield.flavor: You draw forth a tiny shard of Everflame. Under its halo, life flourishes.
Guardian's Shield.target: You and each ally in the burst
Guardian's Shield.effect: Each target gains resist 5 to all damage until the end of your next turn. The first time any enemy deals damage to the target before the end of your next turn, that enemy takes 5 fire damage.
